description:
A low-cut hiking shoe with high-quality materials designed for maximum comfort. The Banks Low Bunion is made of the finest nubuck and suede leather. It’s also equipped with a particularly comfortable sole package. By combining a reinforced PU foam wedge with a high-quality footbed and additional, soft heel reinforcement, the Banks Low Bunion offers particularly good cushioning and soft roll-off performance.

They have integrated a special tongue construction – the Futura tongue – for easy entry into the shoe and uncomplicated adjustment. The Banks Low is ideal for hiking through woods and forests, lower mountain ranges and long, extended walks. The ‘Bunion Hike’ Last for wearers with hallux valgus provides more space at the big toe joint.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: HanWag Banks Low Bunion LL - Mens
